Summary: Triangular, metallic object, in the sky, with multi colored lights.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Clarksville
There were no other sightings in Clarksville on or around September 20th 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at my mailbox at the end of my driveway when I noticed a triangular shaped metallic object in the sky above the cornfield. The craft was about 300 feet off the ground and about 100 yards from me as a distance. It seemed to just hang in the sky making no sound. There were multi colored lights around the perimeter and seemed to blink in a controled fashion. The colores were red, blue, green and white. The sighting in its entirety lasted aprox 2 minutes. When the craft left it slowly rose another 200 feet and then just took off at an amazing rate of speed. When I went to the mailbox I was on the phone and wasnt paying attention to what was going on infront of me. I remember looking at the ground the whole time I was walking. I only noticed it because I saw the beautiful light display from the object from the corner of my eye. I dont remember who I was on the phone with at the time I just rembering saying" oh my God!" The other person said something to the effect of "whats going on?" And I just hung up the phone and stood in amazement. I am a tool and die maker by trade and can honestly say I have never saw something so incredibly beautiful in my life. The craft was a work of art. I just stood there in awe of the creative masterpiece that hung so silently in the sky. The lights seemed to be so clear and vibrant. I would estimate the craft to be the size of a football field. During the sighting I was almost frozen and just stood there even afraid to blink. I knew that what I was seeing was not normal and I didnt want to miss any - thing. There is no way our government could create some thing this awsome in size and to have it so silent. I was not afraid in any way until I went back into the house after the sighting. It was then that I realized what I saw. I know.. what I saw that night was a U.F.O - I did not make a report because I didnt think calling the police was the proper channel. It wasnt until the last year that I heard of MUFON and since decided to make my report.
